\h(<Drachma>)This ship also has a special weapon called the
Harpoon Cannon. It's the horn shaped thing
mounted on the bow of the ship.\e

\h(<Drachma>)In order to use the Harpoon Cannon, you need to
have plenty of Spirit points and use the
”Special Attack” command.\e

\h(<Drachma>)But, regardless of your spirit level, you won't
be able to use the”SpecialAttack” command
unless you have a clear shot at your enemy.\e

\h(<Drachma>)You can only use the ”SpecialAttack”commandon
turns with a special marker at the top of the
column. So keep your eyes open!\c

”Pull away from enemy and go on the defensive.”
”Close in on the enemy and take the offensive.”\c

\h(<ValuanBattleship>)What's this? An Air Pirate ship challenging the
Armada to do battle? Hahaha… Fools! You shall
pay for your insolence with your lives!\c

\h(<Drachma>)An Armada Battleship…
Boy, if you can defeat this ship, you'll clear
this mode.\e

\h(<Drachma>)The Little Jack is equipped with three different
cannons: the Main Cannon, Secondary Cannons, and
Torpedoes.\e

\h(<Drachma>)The Main Cannon is very strong, but can only hit
once per round.\e

\h(<Drachma>)The Secondary Cannons are a little weaker, but
can hit multiple times in a single turn.\e

\h(<Drachma>)The Torpedo can be set to land several rounds
later. It is very useful when you want to
concentrate attacks on a certain round.\c
\h(　Would you like to try again?)
